mapper.select:
select
from `tb_product`
`product_id` = #{productId} and
`product_no` = #{productNo} and
`product_cate` = #{productCate} and
`product_name` = #{productName} and
`product_cate_name` = #{productCateName} and
`product_tag` = #{productTag} and
`principal` = #{principal} and
`sketch` = #{sketch} and
`hotline` = #{hotline} and
`notmobile` = #{notmobile} and
`operate` = #{operate} and
`images` = #{images} and
`views` = #{views} and
`comments` = #{comments} and
`buyfew` = #{buyfew} and
`commission_ratio` = #{commissionRatio} and
`addtime` = #{addtime} and
`isshow` = #{isshow} and
`isdel` = #{isdel} and
`price` = #{price} and
`security` = #{security} and
`trip` = #{trip} and
`origin` = #{origin} and
`destination` = #{destination} and
`product_id` in
#{item} and
`product_id` >= #{productIdSt} and
`product_id` <= #{productIdEd} and
`product_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_cate` in
#{item} and
`product_cate` >= #{productCateSt} and
`product_cate` <= #{productCateEd} and
`product_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_cate_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_cate_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_cate_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_tag` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_tag` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_tag` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`principal` in
#{item} and
(
`Principal` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Principal` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sketch` in
#{item} and
(
`Sketch` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sketch` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`hotline` in
#{item} and
(
`Hotline` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Hotline` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`notmobile` in
#{item} and
`notmobile` >= #{notmobileSt} and
`notmobile` <= #{notmobileEd} and
`operate` in
#{item} and
(
`Operate` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Operate` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`images` in
#{item} and
(
`Images` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Images` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`views` in
#{item} and
`views` >= #{viewsSt} and
`views` <= #{viewsEd} and
`comments` in
#{item} and
`comments` >= #{commentsSt} and
`comments` <= #{commentsEd} and
`buyfew` in
#{item} and
`buyfew` >= #{buyfewSt} and
`buyfew` <= #{buyfewEd} and
`commission_ratio` in
#{item} and
`commission_ratio` >= #{commissionRatioSt} and
`commission_ratio` <= #{commissionRatioEd} and
`addtime` in
#{item} and
`addtime` >= #{addtimeSt} and
`addtime` <= #{addtimeEd} and
`isshow` in
#{item} and
`isshow` >= #{isshowSt} and
`isshow` <= #{isshowEd} and
`isdel` in
#{item} and
`isdel` >= #{isdelSt} and
`isdel` <= #{isdelEd} and
`price` in
#{item} and
(
`Price` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Price` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`security` in
#{item} and
(
`Security` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Security` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`trip` in
#{item} and
(
`Trip` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Trip` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`origin` in
#{item} and
(
`Origin` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Origin` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`destination` in
#{item} and
(
`Destination` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Destination` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

`notmobile` >= #{notmobileSt} and
`notmobile` <= #{notmobileEd} and
`operate` in
#{item} and
(
`Operate` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Operate` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`images` in
#{item} and
(
`Images` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(

) and
`views` in
#{item} and
`views` >= #{viewsSt} and

`addtime` in

`isshow` in
#{item} and
`isshow` >= #{isshowSt} and
`isshow` <= #{isshowEd} and
`isdel` in
#{item} and
`isdel` >= #{isdelSt} and
`isdel` <= #{isdelEd} and
`price` in
#{item} and
(

(

`security` in

if.test: fetchFields.AllFields ==null and fetchFields.fetchFields==null and fetchFields.excludeFields==null and fetchFields.otherFields==null
